mapper.delete: delete from wish_movie where user_code = ${userCode} and movie_code = ${movieCode}
mapper.select: select user_code, movie_code from wish_movie where user_code = ${userCode};

SELECT wm.user_code, wm.movie_code, mm.movie_title, mm.movie_year, mm.movie_origin, mm.movie_poster FROM wish_movie wm LEFT OUTER JOIN movie_mst mm ON(mm.movie_code = wm.movie_code) WHERE wm.user_code = ${userCode};
